scripts.clean: yarn run clean:win || yarn run clean:unix
scripts.install:expo:deps: npx expo install expo-font expo-device expo-camera expo-location expo-secure-store expo-status-bar react react-native react-native-gesture-handler react-native-safe-area-context react-native-screens @types/react typescript -- --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.install:expo: npm run install:expo:base && npm run install:expo:deps
scripts.commit:deps: git add . && git commit -m "Update Expo dependencies and fix expo-doctor issues" && git push origin master
scripts.prebuild:managed: yarn run sync && yarn run clean && yarn run install:expo && yarn run doctor && yarn run doctor:fix && yarn run commit:deps
scripts.build: yarn run prebuild:managed && npx eas build --platform android
scripts.build:android: yarn run prebuild:managed && npx eas build --platform android
scripts.build:ios: yarn run prebuild:managed && npx eas build --platform ios
scripts.build:production: yarn run prebuild:managed && npx eas build --platform android --profile production
